Reviews.Title: I'm a lil Gray (for now)
Reviews.Author: W, J.
Reviews.Content: I just got the phone yesterday. Problem is, it appears to be re-furbished rather than new, and came in a Samsung Note 2 Box. Likewise, the charging port doesn't fit correctly. I previously had the PAE 7100, it crashed, I got a refund, and now am having to send it back, to. Will try one last time depending on seller. When it works (if similar to PAE7100), is awesome, but am starting to have concerns. I've talked to Amazon who have emailed Electronics Mart and now must simply wait and learn patience.

Reviews.Title: This unit was returned
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: Sorry, I don't like giving a bad rating on a product, But this phone deserves it. It is very user unfriendly for a first time smart phone owner. Finding ringtones on the thing is not easy. After 3 days the speaker stopped working and I had to send it back. The return was easy because the staff is helpful and friendly. I opted for my money back and got a full refund quickly. I then purchased the real smart phone from Amazon and I am very happy. Thanks Amazon for another smooth purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: tim williams
Reviews.Content: Fast service, I ordered this phone after reading the reviews on other sites and on amazon so my fingers were crossed on not having a horror story.  I purchased this phone for my wife to replace her Galaxy S2 and we are using it on the Straight talk network and had an AT&T; micro sim but the phone takes regular size so I ordered a 4 in 1 sim card converter, after that setup was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: JUST AS GOOD AS $800 PHONE
Reviews.Author: Floyd C Frawley Jr
Reviews.Content: DON'T BE AFRAID TO BUY ITS COMPARABLE TO S*****G PHONE BUT NO BLOATWARE AT ALL AWESOME PHONE SCREEN COLOR AND RESOLUTION PROS: EVERYTHING, YOU CAN DISABLE FACTORY APPS CLOSEST THING TO BEING ROOTED WITHOUT ROOTING (NO NEED) CONS; NO HDMI OUT (BIG DEAL)

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked world GSM phone. 3G/4G - 850/2100, 2G -850/900/1800/1900. Compatible with AT&T; (4G), T-Mobile (2G), Straight Talk, Simple Mobile and other GSM networks. Please make sure your SIM card is not locked with PUK code.
4G HSPA+ - 850/2100 bands. Fully compatible with AT&T;, Stright Talk(AT&T; Tower) & Net10 (AT&T; Tower) at 4G HSPA+. Compatilble with T-Mobile, Simple Mobile, Straight Talk(T-Mobile Tower) & Net10 (T-Mobile Tower) at 2G (EDGE). For Straight Talk, Simple Mobile or Net 10 will requires a manual APN setup.
MTK6589 CPU - Quad-Core 1.2GHz. 1G RAM & 4G ROM (2G available internal storage). Newest Android 4.2.1 Jelly Bean.
Beutiful large 5.3 inch screen. 5 Point Capacitive Multi-Touch Screen.
No contract AT&T; $50 unlimited everything plan - I recommend getting AT&T; prepaid go phone plan for none smartphone with $50 unlimited everything plan. Get the AT&T; Go Phone SIM card from Walmart website or  just go to AT&T; store and (don't bring your phone) and tell them you have a old AT&T; Motorola razr that you can use and pay $50 and open account for $50 plan. They will give you a SIM card and phone number or transfer your phone number. After SIM card is activated just install that SIM card on your new phone and turn on data connection under SIM management and enjoy it. You can still surf internet on their 4G network. they will not find out what kind of phone you are using since it's unlocked and serial # never registered in their system.
ProductInfo.Name: PAE7189 Unlocked Android Phone 4.2.1 Jelly Bean 5.3 Inch Screen MTK6589 Quad-Core 1.2GHz 1G RAM 4G ROM Dual SIM 4G HSPA+ Tether WiFi GPS AT&T Straight Talk T-Mobile Net10 - Shipping from California
